summary.span: 创建 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素的特定于主题的外观。

span.span: Creates the theme-specific look for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

summary.span: 定义 和 元素的外观。

span.span: A defines the appearance of and elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实际外观取决于用户系统上活动的主题。The actual appearance of the is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system. 此类的属性允许 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 基于当前主题设置外观。The properties of this class allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to set the appearance based on the current theme. 在 XAML 用法中， 对象元素还可以具有子内容，该内容可以是设置 属性的单个 。In XAML usage, a object element can also have child content, which can be a single that sets the property. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `theme:` CLR 命名空间的 xmlns 前缀。An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. 通常，在 XAML 根元素（未显示）中定义 xmlns 前缀和映射。Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 为 或 时，此属性才适用。This property only applies when the is a or . 如果用于项目符号的对象支持 `IsThreeState` 属性，且该属性的值为 `true`，则 `null` 的值可能是用户可设置的。If the object used for the bullet supports an `IsThreeState` property, and the value of that property is `true`, then a value of `null` is potentially user-settable. 否则， 的值不能设置为按用户操作 `null`，但可以在标记或代码中对其进行设置。Otherwise, the value of cannot be set to `null` by user action, but it can be set that way in markup or code. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`| （但是，可能不会在所有主题中设置此属性） (however, this property might not be set in all themes)| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```xaml ``` - 或 --or- ```xaml ```
